reviewText: The surface of the DVD itself looks really weird with lots of defects (bumps on the surface). Funny thing is that the other Solos DVDs don't have this which made me wonder if they used a different company to press Rubalcaba's DVD. However, my DVD player played it find. I was scared because I read the review available here.

I tried four diffrent copies of this DVD, none of them played properly. They all skiped, froze, and wouldn't play certain chapters. I tried playing all of them in three diffrent players including a mac book pro. Where is the quality control? It's 2010, and not hard to make a DVD.
